entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 3 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
